name: ETL Data Extractor Agent
description: Extracts data from a source (e.g., CSV) and stores it as a raw artifact in the database.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Extract CSV Data
skills.description: Reads data from a CSV file and saves it to the artifact database.

source_path.description: Path to the source CSV file within the agent's container (e.g., /data/input.csv).

run_id.description: The unique ID for the current pipeline run.

artifact_db_id.description: The database ID of the created raw_data artifact.

rows_extracted.description: Number of data rows extracted (excluding header).
